name: Judy F
title: Big and chunky and CUTE
des: Kinda big compared to the other wild animals but works because elephants ARE big. So sweet with the little matching baby elephant sold separately.

name: jiaxing h
title: cute donkey
des: My son loves it at first sight. Very colorful and delighted.

name: Patricia C.
title: For my granddaughter
des: These are the most adorable little dolls for toddler play, I’m sure my granddaughter will LOVE them!

name: Susanne C.
title: Fast service and great price!
des: The replacement parts for our Orchard Game came in no time and at a super low cost. The next option was going to be buying the game again which is the version I grew up with...thank you HABA for making replacement parts available!!!

name: Emily N.
title: Wonderful, sturdy shovel
des: Our four year old son loves this shovel! It’s bigger than most little sand shovels, and it’s very sturdy. It allows us to dig nice, deep holes on the beach. It works well for digging in snow, too.
